verses.verse: Then SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a vial <S%H6378><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is it not because the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee to be captain <S%H5057><s%> over his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> ?

When thou art departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from me <S%H5978><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>, then thou shalt find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> by Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> sepulchre <S%H6900><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> at Zelzah <S%H6766><s%>; and they will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, The asses <S%H860><s%> which thou wentest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: and, lo, thy father <S%H1><s%> hath left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the care <S%H1697><s%> of the asses <S%H860><s%>, and sorroweth <S%H1672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What shall I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> ?

Then shalt thou go on <S%H2498><s%> <S%H8804><s%> forward <S%H1973><s%> from thence, and thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the plain <S%H436><s%> of Tavor <S%H8396><s%>, and there shall meet <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> going up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> to Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> kids <S%H1423><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a bottle <S%H5035><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>:

And they will <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> salute <S%H7965><s%> thee, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> loaves of bread <S%H3899><s%>; which thou shalt receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> that thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, where is the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: and it shall come to pass, when thou art come thither <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>, that thou shalt meet <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a company <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> coming down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the high place <S%H1116><s%> with a psaltery <S%H5035><s%>, and a tabret <S%H8596><s%>, and a pipe <S%H2485><s%>, and a harp <S%H3658><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they shall prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8693><s%>:

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon thee, and thou shalt prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8694><s%> with them, and shalt be turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> into another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

And let it be, when these signs <S%H226><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, that thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> as occasion <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> serve <S%H3027><s%> thee; for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is with thee.

And thou shalt go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; and, behold, I will come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto thee, to offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8800><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou tarry <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, till I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to thee, and shew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee what thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And it was so, that when he had turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his back <S%H7926><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him another <S%H312><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>: and all those signs <S%H226><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to pass that day <S%H3117><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thither to the hill <S%H1389><s%>, behold, a company <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> met <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him; and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon him, and he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8691><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And it came to pass, when all that knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him beforetime <S%H865><s%> <S%H8032><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that, behold, he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8738><s%> among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, then the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H7453><s%>, What is this that is come unto the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>? Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets <S%H5030><s%> ?

And one <S%H376><s%> of the same place answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, But who is their father <S%H1><s%>? Therefore it became a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets <S%H5030><s%> ?
And when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of prophesying <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8692><s%>, he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the high place <S%H1116><s%>.

And Saul's <S%H7586><s%> uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him and to his servant <S%H5288><s%>, Whither <S%H575><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, To seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the asses <S%H860><s%>: and when we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that they were no where <S%H369><s%>, we came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>.
And Saul's <S%H7586><s%> uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me, I pray thee, what SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto you.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his uncle <S%H1730><s%>, He told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us plainly <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> that the asses <S%H860><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>. But of the matter <S%H1697><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4410><s%>, whereof SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him not.
And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>;

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, I brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, and of them that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8801><s%> you:

And ye have this day <S%H3117><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, who himself saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%> you out of all your adversities <S%H7451><s%> and your tribulations <S%H6869><s%>; and ye have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Nay, but set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over us. Now therefore present <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8690><s%> yourselves before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> by your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and by your thousands <S%H505><s%>.

And when SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> had caused all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

When he had caused the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> to come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of Matri <S%H4309><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and when they sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, he could not be found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Therefore they enquired <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> further, if the man <S%H376><s%> should yet come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thither <S%H1988><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, he hath hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8737><s%> himself among the stuff <S%H3627><s%>.

And they ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him thence: and when he stood <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, he was higher <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8799><s%> than any of the people <S%H5971><s%> from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to all the people <S%H5971><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye him whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that there is none like him among all the people <S%H5971><s%>? And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, 'Elohim save <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the manner <S%H4941><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4410><s%>, and wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and laid it up <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>. And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> also went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>; and there went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him a band of men <S%H2428><s%>, whose hearts <S%H3820><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of B'liya'al <S%H1100><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, How shall this man save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us? And they despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him no presents <S%H4503><s%>. But he held his peace <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.
